Body:
set_entity_threshold(10)
X = load_wn18()
model = ComplEx(batches_count=100, seed=555, epochs=1, k=50, loss=
    'multiclass_nll', loss_params={'margin': 5}, verbose=True, optimizer=
    'adam', optimizer_params={'lr': 0.001})
try:
    model.fit(X['train'])
except Exception as e:
    print(str(e))
reset_entity_threshold()
